channel.title: Pi mute and enchanted gem help
channel.description: i have tragedy pk source and im still having these problems. i cant seem to find answers or guides on how to fix it:/ i can type ::mutr and it sais i have muted them but they can still talk. this hapens on ::mute and ::ipmute. also how do i make my enchanted gem tell me how many monsters i have to kill for my slayer task or something like that.

item.title: Pi mute and enchanted gem help
item.dc:creator: @Sagi Sagi
item.description:
@Sagi wrote:

deans1243:

also how do i make my enchanted gem tell me how many monsters i have to kill for my slayer task or something like that.

Not spoonfeeding but a hint:
Hint: duradel’s dialogue for that item

Read full topic
item.source: Pi mute and enchanted gem help

item.title: Pi mute and enchanted gem help
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Not to spoon feed, but change this in your connection.java

this

public static boolean isMuted(Client c) { //return mutedNames.contains(c.playerName) || mutedIps.contains(c.connectedFrom); return false; }

to

public static boolean isMuted(Client c) { return mutedNames.contains(c.playerName) || mutedIps.contains(c.connectedFrom); //return false; }

Read full topic
item.source: Pi mute and enchanted gem help
